channel.title: User Access Node (UAN)
channel.description: Recent content on User Access Node (UAN)

item.description: toc_title=merge uan configuration data; given_title=merge uan configuration data; menuTitle: “Merge UAN Configuration Data” date: Sun Mar 26 02:01:01 UTC 2023 draft: false weight: 63 Merge UAN Configuration Data Perform this procedure to update the UAN product configuration. Before performing this procedure, perform Install the UAN Product Stream In this procedure, an upgrade from UAN 2.0.0 to UAN 2.3.1 is being performed. Administrators should replace the versions seen in this procedure with the versions being upgraded on the system.

toc_title=notable changes; given_title=notable changes; menuTitle: “Notable Changes” date: Sun Mar 26 02:01:01 UTC 2023 draft: false weight: 61 Notable Changes The following guide describes changes included in a particular UAN version that may be of note during an install or upgrade. When an upgrade is being performed, please review the notable changes for all of the UAN versions up to the version being installed. If a particular version does not appear in this guide, it may have only had minor changes.

toc_title=upgrade uan software product; given_title=upgrade uan software product; menuTitle: “Upgrade UAN Software Product” date: Sun Mar 26 02:01:01 UTC 2023 draft: false weight: 62 Upgrade UAN Software Product Follow upgrade instructions in HPE Cray EX System Software Getting Started Guide (S-8000) to upgrade the UAN software product. Those instructions provide: Complete information about the options and arguments for the cne-install tool The correct sequence for upgrading UAN and other HPE Cray EX software products.
